summary: Seeking a middle grades math or science teaching position where I can contribute my creativity, classroom management, and instructional skills.

experience.title: Pre-Service Teacher
experience.description: Independently taught a 7th grade science study hall class; constructed lesson plans, observed, and taught 7th and 8th grade Biology; implemented technology and hands-on learning activities; made modifications and accommodations for ESL learners; helped instructors construct lessons aligning with 21st Century Science Education.

experience.title: Pre-Service Teacher
experience.description: Observed, assisted, and taught in a 7th grade science classroom; planned and prepared daily lessons a week in advance; modified instruction and assessments to fit learners' needs; attended 7th grade team meetings, staff professional development, and parent conferences.

experience.title: Sports Supervisor
experience.description: Checked in officials and participants, set up fields/facilities before games; cleaned facilities; provided First Aid; CPR certification available if needed.

experience.title: Clothing Specialist/Cashier
experience.description: Provided customer service; maintained a tidy workspace; ensured correct currency in tills; stocked, blocked, and set up shelves/displays.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science: Middle Grades Education (Science Concentration)

education.school: Caldwell Community College and Technical Institute
